https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/efosWNVX02pCL7mru83xnsOCoXg.jpg Bored with school, 15-year-old Daisuke Kawashima embarks on a pilgrimage to visit the 7,000-year-old cedar tree on distant Yakushima Island. Through his journey, Daisuke meets a number of interesting people, including friendly truck driver Sumire and a mysterious mountaineer girl. A Class to Remember 4: Fifteen
